net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO

Class VbByteReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.AbstractByteReader
      • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.VbByteReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IByteReader, IByteRecordReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VbDumpByteReader

    public class VbByteReader
extends AbstractByteReader
    This class performs record oriented reading of:
  • Mainframe Variable Record Length Binary files
  • Mainframe Variable Record Length Binary files with imbedded block lengths into Array of Bytes
    • Version:
    0.55
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

          BUFFER_SIZE, NOT_OPEN_MESSAGE

      • Constructor Summary

        Constructors 
        Constructor and Description
        VbByteReader()
        This class provides record oriented reading of Variable Record Length Binary files where the record length is held in 4 byte Record-Descriptor-Word at the start of the record.
        VbByteReader(boolean includesBlockLength)
        This class provides record oriented reading of Variable Record Length Binary files where the record length is held in 4 byte Record-Descriptor-Word at the start of the record.
        VbByteReader(boolean includesBlockLength, boolean lengthIncludesRDW) 
        VbByteReader(int includesBlockLength, boolean lengthIncludesRDW)

        • VbByteReader

          public VbByteReader(boolean includesBlockLength)
          This class provides record oriented reading of Variable Record Length Binary files where the record length is held in 4 byte Record-Descriptor-Word at the start of the record.
          Parameters:
          includesBlockLength - weather the file contains block length (ie it is a Dump of the Mainframe VB file)
